Name: Pancakes Amsterdam
Description: At Pancakes Amsterdam, all Dutch pancakes are made with fair-trade buckwheat flour, real eggs, biological milk and our ‘secret ingredient’. Moreover, gluten free pancakes and lactose free pancakes are available at all our locations.

Name: Haesje Claes
Description: Special Glutenfree menu. They also have glutenfree bread and beer.

Name: Mastino
Description: Mastino pizzas are hand made with spelt , multigrain and soya traditional flower.

Name: Lieve
Description: For those of us with allergies or dietary restrictions we have adapted versions of our menu, providing a gluten-, nut- or lactose-free dinner.

Description: GLutenfree options are displayed in the menu
